DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Subject Concomitant Agent Current Medication Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A living person who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, and/or treated in the course of a clinical trial.  This includes studies where an investigator obtains identifiable private information or data through the intervention or interaction with the individual.:A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol._Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A living person who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, and/or treated in the course of a clinical trial.  This includes studies where an investigator obtains identifiable private information or data through the intervention or interaction with the individual.:A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol.

Concepts.definition: A living person who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, and/or treated in the course of a clinical study.  This includes studies where an investigator obtains identifiable private information or data through the intervention or interaction with the individual.

A pharmaceutical agent other than agent(s) tested in a given protocol that is administered to or used by a subject either prior to or during the study. Supportive care and essential ancillary medications required by a treatment regimen should be clearly identified. A protocol's complete instructions including appropriate indication, dosage, administration route, schedule, restrictions to use, and any other relevant data should be explicitly stated. Concept also refers to substance(s) used prior or during the study that are not specified by the protocol.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/5/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup; caAERS v1.0 retired.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
